cause.description:
Magical Rory will be reffered to as 'MR' in this Paragraph with this money we will buy: Some new lighting Pens And pencils Some new microphones Some Jewlery A New Camera Women Some editing software
Even though Magical Rory has over 1500 youtube views it is not yet self suffiecent. I have written some episodes were a green studio is required and a few where it is not. btw we need the money for all of the above and more.
THE PERSON WHO SENDS THE MOST MONEY TO US WILL GET THE PICUTRE MR DREW IN EP 4 IF THEY GIVE US ENOUGH MONEY TO BUY A PROFFESIONAL DV CAMERA WE WILL GIVE YOU THE OLD CAMERA TO USE ON THE WEEKEND!!!!!
luvs D$tyles
1. Freedom
2. Diversity
3. Youth
cause.name: Magical Rory Fund
